comment: * Typed iterator that returns the ancestors of a given node.

variables.name: _nodeType
variables.comment: The extended type ID that was requested.

methods.name: public DTMAxisIterator setStartNode(int node)
methods.comment:
* Set start to END should 'close' the iterator,
     * i.e. subsequent call to next() should return END.
     *
     * @param node Sets the root of the iteration.
     *
     * @return A DTMAxisIterator set to the start of the iteration.

methods.name: public int getNodeByPosition(int position)
methods.comment: * Return the node at the given position.

methods.name: public int getLast()
methods.comment:
* Returns the position of the last node within the iteration, as
     * defined by XPath.
